summary: In order to get out of an extreme situation, would you consider committing murder if the victim himself is asking for it?
cast: Aura Garrido|Maxi Iglesias|Manolo Solo|Luis Fernández|Miguel Ángel Solá|Vicente Romero|María Alfonsa Rosso|Javier Hernández|Jacinto Bobo|Carlos Álvarez-Nóvoa|Alvar Gordejuela|Miguel Ángel Luque|Cristina Mediero|Verónica Goya|Teresa Arbolí|Tato Amador|Antonio Estrada
title: Asesinos inocentes
